Sentencas: This study is an attempt to use Ln2 CuO4 oxides as materials for high temperature air cathodes.
Titulo: LN2CUO4 AIR CATHODES FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS (LN=RARE EARTH)

Sentencas: The oxide powders, prepared by coprecipitation of citrate complexes of Ln and Cu, were sintered onto Y2O3-doped ZrO2 disks.
Titulo: LN2CUO4 AIR CATHODES FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS (LN=RARE EARTH)

Sentencas: Their polarization characteristics were measured at 900-degrees-C in air, using the current interruption method.
Titulo: LN2CUO4 AIR CATHODES FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS (LN=RARE EARTH)

Sentencas: Non-doped Ln2CuO4 electrodes gave essentially the same performance level as that for the well known perovskite oxides.
Titulo: LN2CUO4 AIR CATHODES FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS (LN=RARE EARTH)

Sentencas: When half the Ln site of La2CuO4 was replaced with Tb, the electrode was markedly enhanced, attaining the polarization loss of 20mV at 100mA /cm2.
Titulo: LN2CUO4 AIR CATHODES FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS (LN=RARE EARTH)

Sentencas: Highly resistive compounds formed between the Ln2CuO4 and ZrO2 interface such as La2Zr2O7 and CuO were found to decrease the cell performance, as indicated by comparison between the polarization data and X-ray diffraction patterns of the interfaces.
Titulo: LN2CUO4 AIR CATHODES FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS (LN=RARE EARTH)

Sentencas: The formation of the interfacial compounds could be avoided by sintering the electrodes below 1000-degrees-C.
Titulo: LN2CUO4 AIR CATHODES FOR SOLID OXIDE FUEL-CELLS (LN=RARE EARTH)
